titles.title: Come Magnify The Lord With Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come magnify the Lord with me.
Sing praises to our risen King.
Come magnify The Lord on high.
He's worthy to be praised.
Come magnify the Lord on high.
He's worthy to be praised.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hosannah (men) Hosannah (women)
Hosannah (men) Hosannah (women)
Hosannah to the King (together).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hosannah (men) Hosannah (women)
Hosannah (men) Hosannah (women)
Hosannah to the King (together).
